tool_description: Connect to the Openload File Sharing API to upload, share and edit any file. Test an API call in your browser and export the code snippet into your app.
name: Openload
title: Openload

api_list.name: checkFileStatus
api_list.description: Check the status of a file, e.g. if the file exists

api_list.name: checkRemoteUploadStatus
convertFiles
api_list.description: Convert previously uploaded files to a browser-streamable format (mp4 / h.264)

api_list.name: getAccountInfo
api_list.description: Everything account related (total used storage, reward)

api_list.name: getDownloadLink
api_list.description: Get a download link by using download ticket

api_list.name: getRunningFileConverts
api_list.description: Shows running file converts by folder

api_list.name: getVideoThumbnail
preparingDownload
showFoldersContent
api_list.description: Shows the content of your folders

api_list.description: Set a new name for a folders
